DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVE : I . To determine whether transcutaneous acupuncture point stimulation ( TAPS ) P6 adjuvant treatment standard antiemetic therapy reduces acute chemotherapy induce nausea vomit compare sham acupuncture point stimulation child undergo first round highly moderately emetogenic chemotherapy . OUTLINE : Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . ARM I : Patients undergo TAPS true acupuncture point ( P6 ) 30 minute prior first chemotherapy infusion four time day 20 minute every 2 hour 8am , 10am , 12pm , 2pm . Patients crossover Arm II second course chemotherapy . ARM II : Patients undergo TAPS sham non-acupuncture point 30 minute prior first chemotherapy infusion four time day 20 minute every 2 hour 8am , 10am , 12pm , 2pm . Patients crossover Arm I second course chemotherapy .
